== Service Worker ==
https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/primers/service-worker/

:ajax:
{{{class="code-javascript"

    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open('POST', '/api/fruits/create');
    xhr.send(JSON.stringify({
      someKey: someValue
    }));

    xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
      if (xhr.readyState == 4) {
        if (xhr.status === 200) {
          // do something
        } else {
          // handle error
        }
      }
    }

}}}
